tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name STRING,
  employee_role STRING
)

CREATE TABLE employees (employee_id INT, employee_name VARCHAR(255), employee_role VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE schedules (schedule_id INT, employee_id INT, date DATE, start_time TIME, end_time TIME);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL
);
